elementSpec.desc: contains two dates or another phrase delimiting a time period.
contiene dos fechas u otra frase delimitando un periodo de tiempo.

attDef.desc: indicates the system or calendar to which the date belongs.
indicates the starting point of the period in standard form.
attDef.valDesc: A normalized form of temporal expression conforming to the W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition, except that times may be expressed with reduced precision (i.e., to the minute or the hour).

attDef.desc: indicates the ending point of the period in standard form.
attDef.valDesc: A normalized form of temporal expression conforming to the W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition, except that times may be expressed with reduced precision (i.e., to the minute or the hour).

attDef.desc: indicates the precision to be attached to either or both dates specified.

valItem.gloss: both dates are approximate or unspecified

remarks.p: Software intended for use with W3C XML Schema datatypes may be unable to properly process times expressed with reduced precision.
